organizations.name: Indian Statistical Institute
quotes: I applied and got into the undergraduate program at the Indian Statistical Institute in Kolkata, reputed to be far and away the best place to study math (or mathematical statistics) in India.

organizations.name: ISI
quotes: ISI, as it is popularly known, is – to my knowledge – the only Indian academic institution that was a true world leader in its field;
